DISCHARGE DATE :
**DATE[Feb 22 2007]
Mr. **NAME[AAA] has liver stenosis due to PBC .
Admitted with ascites .
Ascites drained via pigtail .
Several liters drained .
Head CT negative .
Seen by Hepatology .
Ultrasound showed patent vessels and no liver masses .
The patient will be discharged on mild diuretics , Lasix 20 , Aldactone 25 , and a mild dose of a beta - blocker , atenolol 12.5 a day .
To be seen by Dr. **NAME[XXX] with an electrolytes and creatinine check in 1 week .
